alert.note: Alert for Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 26 at 11:59AM CDT until October 26 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL WILSON COUNTY... At 1159 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Poth, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Stockdale and Sutherland Springs. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
